message.raw:
Update retrieve_refs support in the XML class hierarchy for collecting
nested entities

- Make `XML._retrieve_refs`'s error message and documentation more explicit
- Make `_get_info` check to see if the structure flatten is a list and
  embed each element of the list to avoid undesirable mangling by `dict.update`
- Make `MzML._retrieve_refs` more specific
message.html:
Update retrieve_refs support in the XML class hierarchy for collecting

  • Make XML._retrieve_refs's error message and documentation more explicit
  • Make _get_info check to see if the structure flatten is a list and

  • Make MzML._retrieve_refs more specific

message:
Update retrieve_refs support in the XML class hierarchy for collecting
nested entities

- Make `XML._retrieve_refs`'s error message and documentation more explicit
- Make `_get_info` check to see if the structure flatten is a list and
  embed each element of the list to avoid undesirable mangling by `dict.update`
- Make `MzML._retrieve_refs` more specific
